Entries.Aguar: Bah$a#$b#Who’s dumb enough to boil some eggs then hide them just to have a contest so that other people could find them again?
Entries.Bert: HAHA I’ve always wondered what it’d be like if you lost your eggs$h#$b#Oops... Sorry Olga, I’m coming!$u
Entries.Ezekiel: The egg festival has been a tradition since the old times#$b#Nothing beats tradition I always say#$b#What I don’t get is, of all the traditions to make... Why EGGS?!$a
Entries.Freddie: Oh hello there!$h#$b#Now, where can I find those deviled eggs?
Entries.Keahi: I bet I’ll have the most eggs gathered today!#$b#I’ve always been good at finding Trinnie when we play hide and seek!$h
Entries.Lenny: Lewis has been preparing for this since forever!#$b#My, that man just can’t rest till he’s given you all his best
Entries.Lola: I bet I could find those eggs before you do! Haha$h#$b#I’ve got a sharp eye you know. From all the years of training#$b#But of course you guys are the ones who’ll play the game.
Entries.Olga: My my, that Bert and his jokes*face palms herself*
Entries.Pika: Gus and I have been preparing for this since last night!#$b#It’s good to catch a break even for now
Entries.Richard: The festival has brought in a lot of people from around town!$h#$b#I hope they all go to the Cabin Hotel for some refreshments after this!
Entries.Trinnie: Keahi and I are having a contest on who finds the most eggs!#$b#I’m going to beat his donkey!$h
Entries.Yuuma: I see the festival has started#$b#I hope my brother doesn’t tire himself too much$s
Entries.Alissa: I feel giddy inside! I was really looking forward to this.#$b#I find joy in finding eggs in all kinds of places$h
Entries.Alissa_spouse: Oh honey, would you grab me a basket for the egg hunt?$h
Entries.Corine: I love this dress$h#$b#But I feel extremely shy with everybody around$h
Entries.Corine_spouse: Do you like my dress @? I’m wearing it especially for you!$l
Entries.Flor: Social contact helps us cope with stress and major life changes.#$b#I hope this festival makes you feel welcomed in the community
Entries.Flor_spouse: Love, I’m craving for eggs.#$b#Would you get me some?$h#$e#But first give me a kiss*pouts her lips for a kiss*
Entries.Ian: Good thing I had time to clean up and change after I helped set up the place.
Entries.Ian_spouse: I see you’re admiring my handiwork there?#$b#I’ll have you know that you’re still the best spectacle there is in here.
Entries.Jeric: The surrounding’s just so enticing eh?#$b#Much like you are, I’m sure
Entries.Jeric_spouse: I’ve been looking all over for you darling!#$b#My whole life that is$h#$e#I’m so glad I found you$l
Entries.Kenneth: Awww$s#$b#I wasn’t able to get some egg pie! Pika’s was all out!
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: I’m willing to share an egg pie with you$l#$b#Hehe, you should consider that as a compliment because the egg pie is my absolute favorite!
Entries.Maddie: Ugh!$a#$b#I should be at the research facility working on something more useful than this$s
Entries.Maddie_spouse: Hi @!*kisses you*#$b#Would you like to share some devilled eggs with me?
Entries.Philip: The egg hunt is a great way to exercise your body#$b#It delivers oxygen and nutrients to your tissues and helps your heart work more efficiently.
Entries.Philip_spouse: All this movement during the egg hunt, yet my heart moves only for you$l
Entries.Shiro: So many people out here today$h#$b#I just hope my brother loosens up and gives himself a break.$s
Entries.Shiro_spouse: I’m really happy that you’re here$l#$b#Thank you @$h
Entries.Ysabelle: So, what do you think of my dress?$h#$b#It looks chic doesn’t it?
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: I picked this dress for you! Do you like it?#$b#And I want an honest answer alright?$a

Entries.Aguar: The soup tastes heavenly!$h#$b#I wonder if I could get a second helping...
Entries.Bert: I’m going to ask Olga if she wants to dance$u#$b#I’m afraid she might turn into a monster if I don’t haha just kidding$h
Entries.Ezekiel: This flowerdance is just an excuse for young ones to be lazy and get away from work$a#$b#No one dare try to make a move on my little girl!$a#$e#Or else someone’s going to his own funeral!$a
Entries.Freddie: I remember when my wife and I attended a masked ball in the lands of Berbania#$b#Things got so intense that my tie got lost in the maze hihihi$h
Entries.Keahi: Oh maaaan$s#$b#This suit’s making it hard for me to jump around!
Entries.Lenny: I’ve enjoyed quite a few dances in my time.#$b#I could even show you some moves if you want
Entries.Lola: Oh my husband told you about our little adventure did he?#$b#Hihi, that was just an example of how adventurous we are*gives you a wink*$h
Entries.Olga: I’m going to find that husband of mine and make him dance with me!$a
Entries.Pika: My wahine used to enjoy these kinds of events.#$b#She was the reason why I attended these in the first place.
Entries.Richard: Seeing Ysa smile like that just makes my day$h
Entries.Trinnie: Hmmm.. I’m going to see if Keahi wants to dance$h
Entries.Alissa: I really like this dress that Auntie Olga brought for me. It makes me feel light$h
Entries.Corine: I really missed seeing all my friends!$h#$b#It’s a great relief to see them here all in one place!
Entries.Corine_spouse: Oh darling you must meet my friends!$h
Entries.Flor: I believe that it’s beyond my capacity to perform the skills needed for this activity.
Entries.Flor_spouse: Hey @?...Would you like to dance?#$e#Uhm, I may not be good at these things.#$b#But at least I want to try it out with you$l
Entries.Ian: Hello mate!^Hello Lassie#$b#Wonderful day for a dance isn’t it?
Entries.Ian_spouse: My oh my, what do we have here?#h#$b#Would you care to join me for a dance?$l
Entries.Jeric: So many beautiful things to see here$h
Entries.Jeric_spouse: You look handsome baby^You look radiant my queen$h#$b#Would you care as to grace me with a dance?
Entries.Kenneth: Seeing everybody happy is just a treat for me.$h#$b#I hope that this positive energy will continue in the valley$h
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: *hugs you from behind*There you are!$h#$b#Care to dance?
Entries.Maddie: Dancing is just a waste of energy.#$b#I’ve got better things to do$a
Entries.Maddie_spouse: Hello @! I missed you!Have you seen my dress?$h
Entries.Philip: When one dances, they use their core.#$b#It means their abdominal muscles are at work
Entries.Philip_spouse: I know another way of dance that we could do!#$b#*whispers in your ear*We shall do it tonight in the bedroom$l
Entries.Shiro: I’m glad that Yuuma’s mingling with other people.#$b#It must be exhausting to look after me at times$s
Entries.Shiro_spouse: I'm pretty sure I have enough energy to carry you in my arms while we dance.$h
Entries.Ysabelle: I’ll be the Belle of the ball later$h#$b#Just look at my moves and it’ll blow you away!
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: Hey hun, watch me later as I put on a show for you$h#$b#And maybe, I’ll put on a private show for you later on*wink*$l

Entries.Aguar: Ahh my stomach’s gonna be satisfied today!$h
Entries.Bert: It’s the time of the year to stuff our faces with lots of food from the pot-luck! HAHAHA
Entries.Ezekiel: Look at them lazy bones!$a#$b#All the people got nothing better to do than to cook and eat.#$e#Take a look at them pigs tss.
Entries.Freddie: Have you brought some fresh produce to give for the pot-luck?#$b#The governor said he’s so ecstatic to try it out!$h#$e#But the sad part is, the gov’ner forgot about Lola hahaha
Entries.Keahi: Did you see the big bowl for the big soup??#$b#Soon I’m going to cook for the town with a bowl as big as that!$h
Entries.Lenny: I hope the governor appreciates all our efforts$s
Entries.Lola: The governor actually forgot about me!$s#$b#That old man!#$b#I can’t believe after the travels we’ve been with together he forgot about me
Entries.Olga: We gotta keep our fingers crossed and hope that the gov’ner appreciates our efforts$u
Entries.Pika: My wahine used to to love coming to the Luau.#$b#She felt like it was connecting us to our roots.
Entries.Richard: It's important to establish and maintain good relations with important people.#$b#Ofcourse, you have to be genuine about it too!$h
Entries.Trinnie: Soup! Soup! SOUP! Keahi and I love this big bowl soup!
Entries.Yuuma: Are the ingredients of this soup actually healthy?#$b#I must check the contents of this before I give some to Shiro
Entries.Alissa: My farm’s crops have been so good this year that I actually think that the soup would be better this year!$h
Entries.Alissa_spouse: I’ve been looking for you all over the place!$a#$b#I’m so nervous about the soup I might pee my pants love.$u
Entries.Corine: This festival brings everyone together and gives us a chance to bond$h
Entries.Corine_spouse: Hey love, did you know Papa got so excited?#$b#He told me he wanted to give us some of his special dish?#$b#He says it’s so much better than the soup! But you have to keep it a secret
Entries.Flor: I guess the uncontrolled variable would be the ingredients and the controlled variable would be the amount that’s being placed.
Entries.Flor_spouse: I’ve finished assessing the contents of the soup and I believe that you will really enjoy this$h
Entries.Ian: Before I went here, I had to go to Philip to have my hand checked because the bowl slipped my hand$u
Entries.Ian_spouse: *kisses you*I’m so proud of you and for your produce!$h
Entries.Jeric: I still feel so grateful for everything that the governor has done for me. I hope he’s going to be proud$h
Entries.Jeric_spouse: Would you be okay if I introduce you to the governor?#$b#I’m sure he’d like to know the person who makes me laugh and smile everyday
Entries.Kenneth: I see you brought some fresh produce!$h#$b#Surely the governor will be satisfied with us this year.
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: Please don’t stay too close to the water?#$e#I worry that the electric wires might break and hit the water.#$b#I have to keep you safe okay?$l
Entries.Maddie: It seems unsanitary to eat from just anything#$e#I mean it doesn’t have any proper ingredients and everyone just gets to add anything?$u#$b#Like uhh. EW NO$a
Entries.Maddie_spouse: Uhh, hehe would you want me to make you a soup just for you?#$b#I still think this is ehmm.. too mixed up for my taste.#$b#But whatever makes you happy dear!
Entries.Philip: Soup is actually a good way to get the needed water soluble vitamins and minerals that our body needs#$b#But then, we should still eat properly even if it isn’t Luau day.
Entries.Philip_spouse: After the potluck, would you like to take a swim?#$b#We’ll go underwater and maybe... you would want to have fun at the beach?*winks*
Entries.Shiro: Ahh fresh air. I needed this.#$b#I was actually worried I couldn’t come here today
Entries.Shiro_spouse: My my!$h#$b#Don’t you look gorgeous! You look like a breath of fresh air$l
Entries.Ysabelle: Maybe I should recommend to Mayor Lewis next time that I perform for this Luau#$b#After all, this festivity’s more complete with entertainment$h
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: You’ve worked up quite the appetite love#$b#Would you want me to feed you?#$b#With a kiss perhaps?

Entries.Aguar: It’s fascinating to know that Jellyfishes aren’t fish at all.
Entries.Bert: I’m a little nervous$u#$b#I hope Olga likes my gift.#$b#It’s just a little something to remind her of how much she means to me.
Entries.Ezekiel: I remember my dear Helen would always drag me up to watch the jellies migrate#$b#She just knew how to brighten me up.
Entries.Freddie: Come to think of it, Lola and I were much like the jellyfishes before.#$b#We’d often travel and meet new people around the world almost everyday$h
Entries.Keahi: Jellyfishes are boring!$a#$b#I wanna be a shark! Or a whale so that I could SPLASH! SPLASH SPLASH! All over the place.$h
Entries.Lenny: I don’t know why but, tonight’s festival makes me feel giddy inside!$h#$b#I really find it fascinating how the jellyfishes are attracted to the light
Entries.Lola: Right now I wish that Freddie and I were jellyfishes so that we’d be free to travel all we want
Entries.Olga: I’m actually on my way to see Bert.$h#$b#He told me we should meet at the shoreline.
Entries.Pika: The Jellyfishes remind me of all the jell-os that Keahi made for his mom when she was sick$s#$b#It just shows how much Keahi has taken after me
Entries.Richard: Thank the universe that the weather’s good right now.#$b#It gives me a time to breathe away from all the stress.
Entries.Trinnie: I learned about jellyfishes while reading.#$b#Is it true that they sting and kill you?
Entries.Yuuma: I’ve been looking forward to this festival for a while now$h#$b#This is one of the only festivities that I know Shiro would enjoy and he could actually immerse with us.
Entries.Alissa: I’m so ecstatic to see the glowing jellies in a while! I just find their glow so fascinating!
Entries.Alissa_spouse: Do you think I could ask the Mayor if he’d allow me to be the one to light the fire?#$b#I reaaaaallly want to do it love!#$b#What??? Not that it!!$l#$b#But if you insist hihi$l
Entries.Corine: Ahhh, a well-deserved break from all the farming and foraging that you do$h#$b#I hope you enjoy
Entries.Corine_spouse: I’m enjoying this festival better than I did before because I have you to share it with$l
Entries.Flor: Did you know that the tentacles of the jellyfish aren’t involved in swimming?#$b#I read about those in uhmm. Bogarts,uhh history.
Entries.Flor_spouse: Doesn’t the migrating scyphozoan just amaze you?#$b#It’s a magical feeling.#$e#You know @? I’ve been enjoying a lot more because you’re here.$l.
Entries.Ian: At last! I could actually relax$h#$b#I’m looking forward to seeing the jellies float by later!
Entries.Ian_spouse: You must be my lucky star$h#$b#You shine even brighter than the jellies and I’m lucky to have you.$l
Entries.Jeric: I touched a jellyfish!!! I couldn’t believe it!#$b#It was glowing in my hand! It felt amazing!!
Entries.Jeric_spouse: Baby I know a place just behind the shed.#$b#I’m going to wait for you there. Knock twice alright? *Winks*$l
Entries.Kenneth: It’s like the festival is giving mother nature a break from electricity#$b#It warms my heart that we could unplug even just for a while$h
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: I was alone in the dark, but now you’ve come along...#$b#You light up my life, like how the jellyfish lights up the shore.$l
Entries.Maddie: I should either be getting sleep already or working on my research$s#$b#*Sigh*But Mr.Aguar insists on going and I worry for his health
Entries.Maddie_spouse: The night just seems so romantic isn’t it?$h#$b#The lights glowing from the jellyfishes and the fire makes the experience so delightful.$h
Entries.Philip: The jellies are composed of two structures which is called the external epidermis and the internal epidermis#$b#This is actually much like the skin and muscles of humans
Entries.Philip_spouse: Notice how the bodies of those jellies move?#$b#*comes to your ear and whispers*I bet I could move like that for you in the bedroom tonight*winks*
Entries.Shiro: It’s nice to see that Yuumi has the time to relax even for a while.#$b#He worries about me too much. I just wish I wasn’t such a burden to him
Entries.Shiro_spouse: You see the shining across the sky? As well as the glow of the jellies here in the shore?#$b#That’s how much you light up my life$l
Entries.Ysabelle: Staying up late like this isn’t good for my beauty sleep$s#$b#But I really want to see the jellyfish!!
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: Hun...*smiles at you mischieviously*Would you want me to wriggle and writhe like a jellyfish with you under the sheets?*wink*

Entries.Aguar: Don’t bother me, I’m on my way to purchase Gus’ Survival burgers!#$b#I’m on a man mission.
Entries.Bert: No matter how serious the competition is, the camaraderie of this town would always shine bright at the top!
Entries.Ezekiel: These festivals are taking up a lot of time!#$b#What’s so great about the fair anyways?
Entries.Freddie: I brought the best of my farm’s produce today!#$b#Good luck to your entry today!
Entries.Keahi: I’m gonna race you to the ticket booth!!$h
Entries.Lenny: I pray for this fair’s success#$b#Do you know how hard it was to set everything up?#$b#Good luck for later though!
Entries.Lola: Hi dear! Your produce looks good huh. Well, good luck to you!
Entries.Olga: I admire how Trinnie came up with an idea on how to save up for today’s festivities on her own$h#$b#Makes me feel that I’m actually doing something right.
Entries.Pika: I hope people enjoy the food that I prepared for today!#$b#I really poured my heart out for this one$h
Entries.Richard: I really enjoy festivities like this.#$b#These festivals always bring in lots of customers.
Entries.Trinnie: I’m really enjoying today!$h#$b#Keahi and I got a lot of prizes!
Entries.Yuuma: These types of activities are a little bit strenuous for Shiro#$b#I worry for him$s
Entries.Alissa: I’ve never actually tried to play these games before...#$b#I never really had a chance to outgrow my shyness when I was a kid.
Entries.Alissa_spouse: The displays look fantastic! Everybody’s really bringing it on this year!
Entries.Corine: Today’s the day you show off your produce!$h#$b#Did you choose the best of the best?
Entries.Corine_spouse: They said that we must bring the best of the best for today’s festivities!#$b#I believe that you are the best that’s why you’re here with me right now$h
Entries.Flor: The key to winning these games is to observe then conquer!
Entries.Flor_spouse: We play several games throughout our lives.#$b#I believe I’ve already won the game of life when you found me$l
Entries.Ian: *yawns*I feel sleepy. But at least the festival’s a success!$h
Entries.Ian_spouse: I’m sorry I fell asleep on you last night dear!$s#$b#Preparing for the fair just got so intense that Ms. Lenny and I didn’t realize it was so late.
Entries.Jeric: Did you see my display? It looks great doesn’t it?#$b#I really put a lot of effort in it. I hope I win
Entries.Jeric_spouse: I like showing you off just as much as I do my produce.#$b#But you’re the best prize of them all.$l
Entries.Kenneth: I’m glad that you’re enjoying the festival @!It was really all Mayor Lewis’ hard work. I just helped with some stuff.$h
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: I hope you’d allow me to escort you around!$h#$b#I know some hidden spots where we could take a break *winks*
Entries.Maddie: Remember to spend your money wisely!#$e#These festivities are giving you a poor excuse to spend your money.$a
Entries.Maddie_spouse: OOOH!$h#$b#I wanna try those booths! Can I come with you??$h
Entries.Philip: Have you seen Alex?#$b#I’ve been looking for him, we still have something to settle.$h
Entries.Philip_spouse: Before Alex and I have our annual muscle game later, can I get a big kiss from you?$l
Entries.Shiro: I’m actually kind of tired$s#$b#Don’t mind me here. Have fun okay?$h
Entries.Shiro_spouse: I’m sorry if I can’t do a lot of things because of my condition.$s#$b#It must be hard for you to take care of me#$e#Thank you for sticking with me
Entries.Ysabelle: I went to Gus’ stand earlier! His burgers are DIVINE!!
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: Hey love, let’s go around the square and look at the grange displays

Entries.Aguar: I must keep watch tonight#$b#You don’t know what you might see during these festivities
Entries.Bert: Ohhh!$h#$b#Mrs. Evelyn’s pies never disappoints#$b#Don’t tell Olga but I just had my 3rd pie!
Entries.Ezekiel: No one can make me wear a costume!#$e#No one’s the boss of me!$a
Entries.Freddie: I remember the costume Lola had on when she and I met.#$b#She was wearing a latex catsuit *sighs in love*$h#$b#She practically purred her way into my heart.
Entries.Keahi: I’m a rocketman!#$e#I’m going to fly off to the moon and wait for the cow to jump over it!$h
Entries.Lenny: Does the attractions look good?#$b#I’ve been working with Ian and Marlon to make this event a success!
Entries.Lola: When Freddie and I first met, he had this bad-boy bike rider costume really took my breath aaway#$b#But when he saw me I think his world actually stopped hihihi$h
Entries.Olga: I decided to join in with the dressing up!#$b#I’m dressing up as a witch! Hikhikhik*laughs in a witchly manner*
Entries.Pika: Aloha my friend! So what do you think of my costume??#$b#Pretty neat huh?Hahaha$h#$b#Imagine your local chef cutting you in half then serving you for breakfast!
Entries.Richard: I tried my best decorating the hotel. But the only authentic decoration I have are my cobwebs$s
Entries.Trinnie: I decided to go as a princess today! Spy girl was too tight for me so here I am!#$b#A princess!! *twirls for you*
Entries.Yuuma: I actually feel excited for the festivities today!#$b#But uhm...I still really have to take care of my big brother.
Entries.Alissa: Do you think everyone’s staring at me?$u#$b#I think they are! I look silly$s
Entries.Alissa_spouse: Do you think I look silly love?#$e#Really? You like it? *Twirls for you*
Entries.Corine: I’m so glad Ysa agreed to dress up!$h#$b#She looks so beautiful in her tutu!*sigh*I hope she reconnects with her passion once more$s#$b#I only wish for her to be happy
Entries.Corine_spouse: Hey hubby!^Hey wifey!#$b#Do you like my look?$h
Entries.Flor: Even if I think these are superstitious beliefs, I still find dressing up exciting$l
Entries.Flor_spouse: Hey... uhm. Ah. I’m dressed up as a damsel in distress, are you my knight in shining armor?$l
Entries.Ian: Did you see the ‘monsters’ in their cages?#$b#Yikes! It gives me the creeps$u
Entries.Ian_spouse: Do you see those cages over there?*leans over to whisper in your ear* I want to put you in that cage and maybe we can have some 'fun' *smirks*$l
Entries.Jeric: So do you like my costume? I just altered my past costumes to make this one$h
Entries.Jeric_spouse: I heard there’s a maze around here. What do you say we play hide and seek?#$b#You count, I’ll hide and leave a trail of my clothes for you to find me?*winks*
Entries.Kenneth: Lenny and Ian sure did a good job at sprucing up the place!
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: My, you look more radiant than the most beautiful blossom here. I’m so lucky to have you$l
Entries.Maddie: Eugh$u#$b#Playing make believes just a waste of my time#$e#I never really learned how to when I was young.$s#$b#I was too busy learning the Dewey Decimal System
Entries.Maddie_spouse: Hey @! Uhm... What do you think of the costume I have on?$l
Entries.Philip: Dressing up as the blonde Jin Kazama makes me feel so... transformed! HAHA I like it!$h
Entries.Philip_spouse: I lost my way in the maze before.#$b#Aren’t you glad that you found me?$l#$b#But I could certainly get lost again if you want. *winks*.
Entries.Shiro: They decorated the place really well$h#$b#It makes me think about the festivities I joined when I was you$h#$b#I was actually so energetic and would run up to people and scare them to death!$h
Entries.Shiro_spouse: You’re gonna give me a heart attack with what you’re wearing love!#$b#You look so damn fine baby!#$e#I know what I’m saying may be out of character but you just look so good. I’m actually in love with you all over again$l
Entries.Ysabelle: Wearing this tutu brings back so many fond memories$h#$b#I’m trying to go back in touch with my passion for dance$s#$b#I just feel a little scared right now.$s
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: Let’s role play together! I’m a cop#$b#And you’re a bad... BAD, fugitive. I’m here to punish you...

Entries.Aguar: The festival gives balance to our system.#$b#We should be thankful for it.
Entries.Bert: Oh this competition is so much fun ain't it right?$h#$b#Get those fish by the Hook-Line and Sinker!$h
Entries.Ezekiel: Get ready to place your bets on me ‘cuz I’ll win this contest. That’s for sure!$h
Entries.Freddie: I packed up some hot cocoa for me and Lola#$b#It’s for keeping us warm for the festivities.
Entries.Keahi: I made a great big snowman!#$b#But then its head fell off and rolled over making Marnie fall down$h
Entries.Lenny: I never really tried to learn how to fish$s#$b#I was too busy with corporate stuff to go with my father before.
Entries.Lola: Freddie tells me I should bundle up!#$b#He sometimes worries too much but he means well.#$b#He just loves me so much. I’m so lucky$h
Entries.Olga: I’m bundled up in coats and sweaters!#$b#Achoo! ACHOO!#$b#Ugh, My husband isn't even taking the initiative to get me some Hot Chocolate. Achoo!$a
Entries.Pika: I remember the Ice festival last year.#$b#I tried my hand at fishing and I must say, I’m happy with being a cook HAHAHA$h
Entries.Richard: I always remember my Angelica whenever I see the kids make snow angels$s#$b#I have so many fond memories of her that could last me the rest of my lifetime.
Entries.Trinnie: Just watch me trump Jas’ snowman with my penguin!#$b#Keahi’s going to be so impressed!$h
Entries.Yuuma: I wonder if I could ask Phillip about what we could do for Shiro#$b#Maybe we could make up a device that would help him move a lot better.
Entries.Alissa: It’s a great day for Ice fishing!#$b#I just hope that the sun won’t melt the ice.
Entries.Alissa_spouse: I brought hot cocoa for us!#$b#Would you want me to pour you some?$h
Entries.Corine: Hello! It’s a nice day to do some ice fishing isn’t it?$h#$b#Remember to put your safety first alright??
Entries.Corine_spouse: Best of luck for the competition @!$h#$b#I’m rooting for you!#$e#You’ll get a big kiss from me after!$l
Entries.Flor: Hello there, Are you ready for the Ice fishing contest today?#$b#You should try using wax worms or maggots as bait. I read that they catch good fish
Entries.Flor_spouse: *kisses you*Good luck for the Ice fishing competition!$l
Entries.Ian: Beautiful day today isn’t it?$h#$b#I helped with the preparations today. Ms. Lenny asked for me#$b#But right now, I’m on my way to make some snowmen!$h#$b#Yay for a break!
Entries.Ian_spouse: Why don’t you sit on the snow, I’ll try to make you a snow sculpture$l
Entries.Jeric: I’m confident that I’ll win the competition later!#$b#Hah! I’m still the best Ice fisher there is
Entries.Jeric_spouse: Have you ever done it on the snow before?*winks*
Entries.Kenneth: This festival releases the fish because they know that we’ve got no use for them for now.#$b#It’ll just go bad if we don’t do it.
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: All those fish I caught, yet my favorite catch is you*wink*$l
Entries.Maddie: Y’all know that one could die with hypothermia right??RIGHT?#$b#I just don’t understand the point of all this$a
Entries.Maddie_spouse: Husband!^Wife!#$b#Could you come here and give me a hug?$s#$b#I’m freezing right now.
Entries.Philip: Do you know that nerve impulses are sent to muscles so that they could generate extra metabolic heat through shivering$h#$b#Haha oh I’m sorry, I’m just blabbering PT stuf
Entries.Philip_spouse: During cold weather it’s better to snuggle with no clothes on to generate body heat*wink*$h
Entries.Shiro: Attending these festival just reminds me of what lost#$b#I wish I just stayed home
Entries.Shiro_spouse: Hey love, can I ask for a hug?#$b#I feel so cold#$e#You feel so much warmer. Thank you so much$l
Entries.Ysabelle: The ice sculptures remind me of marble statues over at the ballet theatre at home when I was young$h
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: Baby, *goes over your ear and whispers* Sculpt me like one of your French girls$l

Entries.Aguar: Merry yuletide season to all!#$b#May we have more prosperous research to come in the following year!$h
Entries.Bert: I’m glad that Trinnie’s happy with her gift!$h#$b#It’s a good thing Olga didn’t get mad at me for spending so much on her gift.
Entries.Ezekiel: The only good thing about this festival is the food!#$b#Oh and of course my daughter.#$b#But the rest of it is just BAH Humbug!
Entries.Freddie: I’m grateful for everything Lola and I have been through.$h#$b#My wish for you son,^My wish for you dear#$b#is that you’ll find someone who’ll make you even
Entries.Keahi: My dad gave me a chef’s hat!$h#$b#OH! OH! OH! I think I wanna be a chef now!#$e#Keahi, the tumbling, chef-magician of the valley! The best at making your food tumble and disappear! HAHAHA$h
Entries.Lenny: I’m not expecting much#$b#But I hope that maybe someone might remember me and my efforts too.
Entries.Lola: Happy Winterstar festival to you @!#$b#I hope the upcoming year brings you much joy and abundance$h
Entries.Olga: Are you enjoying today’s festivities?$h#$b#I’m excited to hear about the first Winter star!
Entries.Pika: I know my wahine’s that winter star who’s shining from above#$b#I just hope that he’s proud of me and our Keahi!$h
Entries.Richard: This year has been good to everyone!#$b#My wish before the year ends is that my darling Ysa connects with her passion once again.#$e#I just want that and nothing else$h
Entries.Trinnie: IT’S THE MOST WONDERFUL TIME OF THE YEAAAAAR!#$b#I’m so happy my dad actually gave me a beautiful dollhouse!!$h
Entries.Yuuma: Before this year ends, I hope that the stars will bless Shiro#$b#I hope for his happiness and health.
Entries.Alissa: Tis the season to be jolly! Fa la la la la la la la la!$h
Entries.Alissa_spouse: Hey Mister!^Hey Missy!#$b#You owe me a kiss! I was waiting for you under the mistletoe earlier!
Entries.Corine: Have you already thought of things that you’re grateful for?#$b#I hope you have an even better new year$h
Entries.Corine_spouse: You’re a great blessing and I can’t imagine life without you$l#$b#Thank you for making the year and the next years a great one$h
Entries.Flor: Have you heard the story of the Winter star?#$b#Willy tells the story beautifully.
Entries.Flor_spouse: Happy holidays to you love, may the next year bring us bountiful produce and a happy family.$h#$e#Thank you for being here with me
Entries.Ian: The Feast of the Winterstar has  been one of the best festivities we have! I really enjoyed decorating the tree with the Mayor and Ms. Lenny$h
Entries.Ian_spouse: I think it’d be fun to grow a pine tree on our farm.#$b#We could decorate it every winter and have fun with our kids when we decide to have them right?$h
Entries.Jeric: This year was a bountiful harvest!$h#$b#Hopefully the next year would bring in more crops and produce!#$e#If ever you need help with your farm, don’t hesitate to tell me alright?
Entries.Jeric_spouse: I’ve been dreaming of a family of my own$l#$b#You gave me that dream. I know it’s just us two for now, but we’re still considered a family right?
Entries.Kenneth: Oh dear, I hope that the many lights on the tree won’t cause  a power surge.$u
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: Baby, you light up my world like nobody else.$l#$b#Being the way that you are is enough and everyone else in the room can see it.$l#$bI’m the luckiest guy here$h
Entries.Maddie: I’m looking forward for this festival to end#$b#UGH$a
Entries.Maddie_spouse: Thank you @, for making this drab world less annoying$l#$b#I hope the new year would bring us bliss$h
Entries.Philip: I hope you have a joyful new year!#$b#Always remember to take care of yourself and exercise okay?#$e#You wouldn’t want to get sick and immobile now would we?
Entries.Philip_spouse: Your hand fits in mine like it’s made just for me. It went in my mind that it must’ve been meant to be. It all just makes sense because you’re here with me now$l
Entries.Shiro: You know what @? It’s important to make the most out of every moment#$e#Live you’re your life to the fullest while you’re still complete.#$b#You never know what might go missing one day.$s
Entries.Shiro_spouse: I’ve lived. You know?#$b#I can’t say that I’ve lived a full life.But I’ve lived.$s#$e#I almost died, I’m still sick... I lost all hope before because it was so hard.#$b#But you are here despite all that. And I’m glad you stuck with me through it all.#$b#I’m so lucky to have you. I’m so grateful for you$h
Entries.Ysabelle: I hope someone gives me new pointes$s#$b#My old one’s a little too unsteady for me
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: I’m so happy that you’re here with me love!$h#$b#You’re the best gift I have ever received!$l#$e#I hope the next years would be more bountiful and maybe, we could have a little one of our own$h
